hero.description: Welcome to our tool designed to facilitate the management of social and human factors in requirements management in software ecosystems. Our intuitive platform was developed especially for requirements analysts, developers, and project managers, helping them to understand and effectively address the social and human factors that directly impact the success of their activities during software development in complex environments. Explore the tool's features to gain practical insights, improve communication and collaboration within your team, and implement significant improvements in your projects. Start using our interactive tool now and discover how we can help elevate the quality of your work!
hero.title: Explore the social and human factors that influence requirements management in your software ecosystem.

list_item.1: Identify the social and human factors influencing requirements management activities in your software ecosystem;
list_item.2: Discover the contextual characteristics of requirements management in your software ecosystem;
list_item.3: Highlight the barriers you and your team face in improving social and human factors in requirements management in your software ecosystem.
list_item.4: Obtain suggestions for improvement strategies and coping mechanisms to use during requirements management activities in your software ecosystem.

main.title: Gain a comprehensive understanding of your software ecosystem's social and human factors influencing requirements management.
